current_contact.agency: Nueces Co. Medical ExaminerOfc Of The Goliad Cnty JP

case_circumstances: Body recovered from San Antonio River.  It is believed the decedent was using a flash light to guide a plane onto a caliche road on the Spires Ranch located 14 mi S/SW of Goliad (3 mi N of US HWY 59).  It is believed the landing gear (wheels) hit the decedeent (piece of body tissue was found on an area near the wheel). The body was found 300 yds from a bridge located 5 mi from the plane site, in which an empty plane was found burned the previous week.
case_clothing_on_body: Wrangler jeans, large size blue shirt with a label of Sears sportswear, boxer undershorts size 36 from JC Penney's, & a brown belt size 36
case_footwear: White athletic socks & athletic shoes with velcro tabs Stadia brand size 8
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
